page.title: 06Working Adults
page.content: Working Adults. Shopkeeper. At about 8.00 AM, Dad gets to the shop and sets it up. When he has loaded what is required, and Mum has arrived, he goes to the other shop and unloads what is left. Then he goes back to our first shop and they have a pie each for dinner. Then Dad delivers fruit and vegetable orders until 5.00 PM travelling backwards and forwards between the two shops where necessary. He gets home between 6.30 and 9.00 PM and sometimes falls asleep in the chair. Eventually he goes to bed.
